long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension catches the source of the free video players and replaces the player interface with a new player with extra functionality. Only works with embedded videos. Pressing the play button may depend on the video service host. It is simple to use, just install it, navigate to the embedded video player where Pure Motion is implemented and wait for the extension to switch to the usual player. The extension can be tested at https://www.thepuremotion.com/demo/.

Player extra features:
- click in the video: start/stop playback
- press left arrow: jump forward
- press right arrow: jump backward 
- press up arrow: increase volume
- press down arrow: decrease volume
- switch between resolutions
- switch between subtitles

The extension does not store or collect any data.
